Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory100.png'}
{1: "Within Earth's troposphere", 2: 'Altitude 4000 meters'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryLineSpreadNew.prefab', 2: '1'}
{3: 'The variable cycle engine roars under the combination of fuel and combustion agents.'}
{3: 'The transport craft breaks the sound barrier in a flash, leaving a conical sonic boom cloud in the air, climbing at a speed of 8km/s.'}
{3: "The immense thrust brings over ten G's of pressure, but since his transformation into a Construct, he no longer needs to rely on chest contractions to breathe."}
{3: 'Suddenly, a weird blip appears on the radar, diving toward him with astonishing energy.'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'Non-friendly unit?', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Watanabe gently pushes the control stick to one side, only to find several more blips appearing on the radar one after another.'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'What the heck are these?', 4: '1'}
{3: "He doesn't slow down but continuously adjusts his climbing posture to avoid the unknown targets."}
{3: 'They soon meet, and he can finally see...'}
{3: "It's a burning wreckage. Its temperature is rising to an unimaginable level while it is passing through the atmosphere, shedding molten fragments as it falls."}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'Ambition...?', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Watanabe can barely make out the engraved letters on the surface of the wreckage.'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'Are these... starship wreckages?!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Onboard Radar', 3: 'Warning! High thermal reaction ahead, please dodge!'}
{2: 'Onboard Radar', 3: 'Warning! High thermal reaction ahead, please dodge!'}
{3: 'With the alarm comes a dense array of blips on the radar, and the sky before him turns to the color of dusk at a visible speed.'}
{3: 'But this is not a scene worth admiring, it is the smoke and clouds of countless wreckages hurtling toward Earth through the atmosphere.'}
{3: 'Watanabe has to focus all his energy on maneuvering the transport craft to dodge the falling debris.'}
{1: 'Altitude 7000m; speed 10km/s', 3: '60'}
{3: 'Altitude 7000m; speed 10km/s'}
{3: 'He narrowly dodges a burning wreckage, which seems to be part of a weapon mount.'}
{1: 'Altitude 50km; speed 12km/s', 3: '60'}
{3: 'Altitude 50km; speed 12km/s'}
{3: 'Like a nimble fish, he weaves through the burning reefs.'}
{1: 'Altitude 500km; speed 15km/s', 3: '60'}
{3: 'Altitude 500km; speed 15km/s'}
{3: 'At such high speeds, it is impossible to predict the route. Watanabe can only rely on his reflexes to avoid one wreckage after another.'}
{1: 'Altitude 5000km; speed 20km/s', 3: '60'}
{3: 'Altitude 5000km; speed 20km/s'}
{3: 'The transport craft reaches its theoretical speed limit. Though the heat shield is still functioning normally, the cabin temperature continues to rise.'}
{1: 'Altitude 8000km; speed 20km/s', 3: '60'}
{3: 'Altitude 8000km; speed 20km/s'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryLineSpreadNew.prefab'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgCg/CgJD01.jpg'}
{3: 'The moment the system indicates they have broken through the atmosphere, countless flames immediately catch his eye.'}
{3: "The shattered wreckages are either flying off into deep space or are captured by Earth's gravity, turning into deadly fireballs."}
{3: "The spaceport is in ruins. Anti-aircraft cannons roar silently in the void but still can't intercept all the debris."}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgCg/CgJD03.jpg'}
{3: 'A starship is split in half by the violent explosion, forming a massive fireball at the explosion site.'}
{3: 'Its central core is the brightest. The outer shell looks a bit thin due to rapid expansion, and the magnetic field is twisting it into an elliptical shape, like a peeled egg.'}
{3: 'A green egg, several times brighter than the sun.'}
{3: 'The transport craft immediately activates its isolation shield to prevent the radiation from damaging the plane and its occupants.'}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgCg/Cg4101_15.jpg', 3: '0', 4: '1', 5: '1'}
{3: 'After the explosion, the surviving Fenrir fighters speed toward the last starshipâ€”the flagship "Miracle".'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory100.png'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'This is Watanabe of the Ground Force. Please identify yourselves.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Watanabe quickly opens the all-channel communication, but under the intense radiation interference from the nuclear explosion, the channel is filled with meaningless static noise.'}
{2: '?', 3: 'Watanabe... does the ground already know our situation here?'}
{3: 'After a long while, a voice finally came through, although severely distorted by the interference.'}

{1: '1', 2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'We learned during a mission that the space fleet might be subjected to malicious commands. Relevant information is currently being synchronized with headquarters.', 4: '1'}
{2: '?', 3: "Malicious commands... So that's it. Only that could have done this."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'Friendly unit, please report your status.', 4: '1'}
{2: '?', 3: '...The starships went haywire. The suicide squad decided to stop the ships by self-detonation to prevent them from reaching Babylonia.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Watanabe', 3: '...Is Shin, the command officer, still alive?', 4: '1'}
{2: '?', 3: "He's on the list too, I'm his lieutenant..."}
{3: 'The channel is filled again with static noise, but Watanabe feels even that is fading away.'}
{2: '???', 3: 'Help... space... station... under attack!'}
{3: 'More messages seem to be coming through the communication channel, but he has no time for it...'}
{2: '???', 3: 'Help... space... station... under attack!'}
{3: 'Is someone calling for help?'}
{2: '?', 3: 'Go now. The command officer made these choices to save more lives.'}
{2: '?', 3: "Now it's your turn to do more."}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'Got it!', 4: '1'}
{3: 'The person is right. Even if his original goal was lost, there are still more things he could do.'}
{3: 'A close friend once told him not to mourn the dead with sadness and inertia, but to turn them into a force for moving forward.'}
{3: "Since his father upheld his beliefs, it's now his turn to pass on the baton."}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'This is Watanabe of the Ground Force, en route to the space station. Please report your situation!', 4: '1'}
{2: '?', 3: 'Safe travels.'}
{1: '1', 3: 'Watching the transport craft head toward the space station, Shin cuts off the communication.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunHalfNew.prefab', 3: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Cyril', 3: 'Not planning to say goodbye?', 4: '1'}
{3: "Cyril, who hasn't spoken the whole time, finally speaks."}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunHalfNew.prefab', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Shin', 3: 'Even I would feel sad if I were to say goodbye in this situation...', 4: '1'}
{3: 'He stares at the approaching flagship, almost able to feel the heat of the exhaust flames.'}
{2: 'Shin', 3: 'If he knew I were still alive, he would regret not coming earlier. As a father, how can I let my child live with that regret?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Shin', 3: "I already missed out on being there for him. I can't give him more regrets.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'He navigates the escape pod toward the death.'}
{2: 'Shin', 3: "I've said everything that needed to be said.", 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiZhuanchangBaiBegin.prefab', 2: '1'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxTongyong/FxUiMemoryInformation.prefab'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory428.jpg'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiZhuanchangBaiEnd.prefab', 2: '2'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiZhuanchangBaiBegin.prefab'}
{3: 'Before being engulfed by the flames, the soul that has drifted in space for so long seems to have returned to the ground due to gravity.'}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory559.jpg', 3: '0', 4: '0.5', 5: '1'}
{3: 'Lush green grass, full of life.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Shin', 3: "Such a beautiful planet... It's so difficult to leave it behind.", 4: '1'}
{1: 'DialogDisable'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory100.png'}
{1: '1', 3: "A sudden unease grips Watanabe's heart. He looks back at the newly formed green fireball.", 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryLineSpreadNew.prefab', 2: '1'}
{3: 'Gritting his teeth, he rushes toward the space station as fast as he can.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'To those... who still need him!', 4: '1'}
